name: Hugo's House of Horrors
description:
One of the most popular arcade/adventure games we've ever released, you help the lovely and elusive Penelope rescue Hugo from a haunted house.

You answer questions and gather clues in this classic game of logic and intrigue. Highly addicting...evenings of fun...this one features superb hi-res color animation and engaging play for children and adults alike!

If you like adventure, you'll love Hugo!
